lines.text: [as Titanosaurus attacks Tokyo, one of two kids is eager to take a peek at the monster]
Don't go. Don't go, Ken, it's too dangerous!
All right, I'll go there by myself!
All right, I'll come, too.
[Titanosaurus sees them; the boys panic and run away as Titanosaurus chases them and prepares to trample them]

[terrified]
Ahhhh! Godzilla! Godzilla! Godzilla!
[Godzilla pops up]

[points gun at Ichinose]
Don't come any closer.
Don't, Katsura.
I warn you. Stay back!
You can't do it. You wouldn't shoot me!
You're wrong. I'm not alive. I may look like a girl, but I'm not. I'm a cyborg!
[Katsura is shot in the arm by Murakoshi]
Forward, Titanosaurus, Mechagodzilla!! Destroy them utterly!!!
[Tsuda urgently enters Mugal's quarters with a salute; Mugal is strangely calm]
Mafune sent Titanosaurus out without our instructions!
I already know.
I'll tell him to stop straight away or he will spoil our plans!
Now, don't rush in!
What?

[points to the Super Geiger Computer]
Take a look at this.
Huh? It is a Super Gieger!

[on the monitor, a white dot in the Southern Japan Sea heads for Tokyo]
What is Mechagodzilla's strongest enemy?
Godzilla!
Quite right. Take a look. Godzilla's challenging. He wants to fight Titanosaurus.
[pause]
All right, we'll let them fight. Titanosaurus will be killed and Godzilla badly hurt; then, Mechagodzilla will be alone and we will march on Tokyo unopposed, and then we'll destroy it utterly!
[both men laugh maniacally]
Wait till I really let Titanosaurus loose!
But why, Father? This is it... we'll hand over the Earth to the spacemen. Surely you don't mean... you'd release the disaster monsters again? Like King Ghidorah, mighty Radon, and terrible Manda?
[stock footage of said monsters briefly appear around her in a montage]
Titanosaurus is going to join the ranks of the killers?

Katsura, I'm not doing this for the spacemen! I don't have to take their orders! Mechagodzilla is just a machine. He's no match for Titanosaurus! Titanosaurus has brains, he's alive! I want to show them what he can really do!
[pause]
I'll teach those humans for failing to recognize me. They mocked me. Well, now they're going to eat their words! Go, Titanosaurus!
[the Interpol staff watches on live TV as Mechagodzilla completely wipes out part of a city with his new improved Finger Missiles]
Revolving missiles... Mechagodzilla has new weapons!
It's terrible! Godzilla might lose!!
[an alarm buzzes, indicating that Godzilla is approaching, as Wakayama stares in grim silence]
This is Yamashita. He's just come from Shizuoka.

[bows]
Good day.
Somebody handed him this in the Amagi Mountains.
[hands a small fragment of metal to Muraokshi, who examines it]
It's metal. it's Space Titanium!
Analyze it straight away. I think you might be right.
Right. How did he get it?

I was fixing an underground water pipe when suddenly a man rushed out of the bushes and gave it to me. He had... a jagged scar on his throat. He couldn't speak at all, so he wrote something - the word "Interpol" - on the palm of his hand, then he pushed me back down and ran away. I could hear the other man was chasing him.
Well, judging from the report, it was Kusakari.
Is he up there?
Order a full search.
Right. Is there a chance he's alive?
We know he WAS alive when he gave the metal to Mr. Yamashita.
[Tagawa is in grim silence]

[over who sabotaged the Supersonic Wave Oscillator]
It couldn't be Katsura! She just went and found her father's notebooks!
Why not? She's the only outsider who knows anything about it. She could've sabotaged it!

[outraged]
Now, listen, if that's your reason, then why the hell don't you suspect me? I tell you, she's not like that!
Ichinose!
[pause]
Forget her. She's no good now.
I'm sorry, I still trust in her! No matter what you say!
[Ichinose angrily walks out of the laboratory as Yamamoto tries to reason with him]
Ichinose!
Yamamoto!
[Murakoshi stops Yamamoto as Ichinose slams the door offscreen]
Yamamoto... it'll be all right. Better take care. Leave him alone for now.
[Mugal, retreating towards a cliff, is confronted by Interpol agents]

[laughs maniacally]
Come on and shoot. You can't kill me, anyways, so what do your bullets matter?
[laughs maniacally]

[evil chuckle]
Don't try to escape, Earthling, or you'll force us to kill you!
Father, a man from Interpol came.
What's that?
Interpol?
They asked to see you. They wanted to know about dinosaurs.

Heh! Heh-heh-heh-heh-heh-heh-heh! Eh-heh-heh-heh-heh-heh! Heh! They've arrived fifteen years too late to ask me about that. Heh! Heh-heh-heh-heh-heh-heh. I told them then I'd make them sorry. Now my theory has proved to be correct, I'll take revenge on them all, on those fools who thought I was crazy and forced me to resign! Ah-ha-ha-ha-ha!

Your heart is frozen and dry. Who'd love a cyborg, a person who is not a person? So remember, forget about Earthlings. They're no concern of yours. There's only one emotion that controls your mind. What emotion is that? What controls you?

[listlessly]
Vengeance and hate. Revenge.
Quite right. That's good.
Just sit still. Stay there quietly and you'll witness the end of your city.
Who are you, anyway?
The second coming.
